rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample storage and a small sitting area.
Open space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall to allow abundant natural light. Scandinavian minimalistic decor with a warm palette.
Adjacent to the living room for seamless flow during meals; minimalist design with subtle textures.
Modern kitchen integrated into the dining area, featuring sleek cabinetry and energy-efficient appliances. Vastu-aligned placement of gas stove on the east wall.
Dedicated workspace with natural lighting; ideal for joint family members working from home.
A comfortable guest room positioned near the entrance for convenience while ensuring privacy.
Small living space for household staff, equipped with basic amenities and a small kitchenette.
Spacious ensuite bathroom for the main living area; includes essential fixtures and ambient lighting.
Well-equipped private gym with high ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure adequate natural light, and a Scandinavian minimalist aesthetic.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with Scandinavian aesthetics; Vastu suggests the north for welcoming positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling window to allow abundant natural light and enhance the minimalist Scandinavian design aesthetic.
Complementary floor-to-ceiling window ensuring balanced light distribution across living spaces.
Service door to access the private gym and other utilities; designed in line with Scandinavian minimalism.
